Articles.Content:
\*if this is not clear please tell me\*

So I always thought. Is it possible to land an asteroid that is a type C on Kerbin..

You can use the asteroid day mod if you want but no mods like HyperEdit.

And the Jebidiahs Swag of Approval goes to.. -

[https://imgur.com/a/FbRop#0](https://imgur.com/a/FbRop#0)

it's an old album. but yes it is possible.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T13:50:08Z" title="07/06/2015 01:50  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by Zipmafia**

1000 ton asteroid from Zip's old challenge:cool:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/KY54j)

We like our challenges to have more structure to them. Please review the [guidelines](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide)and then submit an actual challenge.
